description:
Facing bankruptcy may seem overwhelming, but it is not something anyone has to go through alone. At Darrell Castle and Associates in Memphis, Tennessee, we offer free initial consultations to people who are dealing with financial problems. The attorneys at our law office have decades of combined experience not only in filing for bankruptcy but also in initiating personal injury and Social Security disability claims. Further, we help clients rebuild their lives, either through improving their credit scores or obtaining compensation for their injuries.

A car accident and credit card debt may seem like two completely different situations, but each may leave someone feeling uncertain and afraid. At our law office, we strive to give people peace of mind by clearly explaining their options. Our attorneys empower clients to make informed decisions about their future. We have earned a reputation for our outstanding customer service, and our founder holds the rating of BV Distinguished* from Martindale-Hubbell.

At Darrell Castle and Associates, serving clients throughout Western Tennessee is more than just our job; it is our calling. We are passionate about assisting people through some of the darkest times in their lives. The team at our law office takes every measure possible to accommodate clients, such as accepting credit cards.

Darrell Castle and Associates is a debt relief agency and helps people file for bankruptcy protection under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.

* AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review Rating™ fall into two categories – legal ability and general ethical standards.
